programme.desc: On a trip aboard the Maharajas’ Express, Rohit and Manasi find themselves taking a walk on the wild side.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Great World Hotels Taj Tashi (ENG)
programme.desc: Cradled in the folds of the Himalayas, Bhutan’s geographical isolation has helped to preserve its unique cultural identity.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Indonesia's Romantic Getaway
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Indonesia's Romantic Getaway, Borobudur
programme.desc: Amidst ancient temples and misty morning hills, Sangeeta and Manish step into Borobudur’s timeless embrace, where history and serenity intertwine.

programme.title: Bliss
programme.desc: From hot air balloon rides to visiting cave houses, Kirsty explores the rich geological, cultural and historical heritage of beautiful Cappadocia.

programme.title: Best From The Rest
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Best From The Rest Oman Must Sees
programme.desc: Here is a list of Oman’s must-see attractions, each of which unveils a unique facet of this Middle Eastern gem.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Xp Guide Amman, Jordan
programme.desc: Amman, the capital of Jordan sits on a wealth of seven hills, a monotonous sea of white cement structures with the occasional minarets and buildings.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: In Barcelona, Alex visits San Sebastian beach and Camp Nou stadium, home of FC Barcelona. She also enjoys delectable seafood and heady sangrias.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Food Fact Fun New Taipei City, Taiwan
programme.desc: In New Taipei Alex explores the fish, market San Domingo fort, the Gold museum, New Taipei Yingge Ceramics Museum and at last he ends his journey with letting off a sky lantern at Jiufen village.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Timeless Tamil Nadu Thanjavur, India
programme.desc: Alex takes a trip to Thanjavur, curious about why it has always been called “the cradle of arts”. Soon, she is lost in the magnificence of the Great Living Chola Temples, with their stunning architecture and intricate carvings, rich in symbolism. At a center for making bronze statues, she is surprised to find out how ancient is the art form. The highlight of her trip, however, is a visit to a workshop for making musical instruments, where she is treated to an impromptu performance.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Xp Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: With a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, Oslo’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Which is the UNESCO City of Literature? Here's a clue - it's also the treasure trove of Guinness! Taste the merriment in Dublin.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 City Breaks Barcelona, Spain
programme.desc: From Antoni Gaudi’s whims to hosting the 1992 Olympics, Alex finds out that Barcelona has been shaped by many different things.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: After seeing La Sagrada Familia, Gaudi's labour of love, Alex visits La Rambla, the Olympic Stadium and Poble Espanyol, in Barcelona.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Food Guide Budapest, Hungary
programme.desc: Traditional Hungarian fare is a hearty affair, not meant for the faint-hearted. The cuisine has imbibed influences from the days of its Ottoman occupation as well as from the other nations of the Austro-Hungarian Empire and traditional Jewish cuisine. Celebrity chef and traveller, Joe Remblance explores the nuances of this cuisine in Budapest, the capital city, through local dishes such as Schnitzel, Gundel Palacsinta, Hungarian Lángos and Tokaji, a sweet Hungarian wine.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Timeless Tamil Nadu Nilgiris, India
programme.desc: Ooty has been known to charm visitors ever since British officers used to go there to escape the infamous Indian summer. Sipping tea at the tiered tea plantations, strolling by serene lakes and gushing waterfalls, gawking at gentle deer and majestic elephants at Mudumalai National Park, Alex loses herself in the breathtaking natural beauty of this retreat nestled in the Nilgiri hills.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Xp Guide Oslo 2, Norway
programme.desc: During Elisha’s visit to Oslo, she finds herself in awe of the extraordinary well-designed ships used by the legendary Vikings of Norway.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Driving along the world's longest defined coastal route has a lot of surprises in store. Right from the arty Galway city to the wilderness in Burren.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 City Breaks Valencia, Spain
programme.desc: Valencia, the birthplace of paella, has got the bones of a metropolis and the heart of a quaint seaside town. Alex Outhwaite experiences this when she visits the strikingly futuristic City Of Arts And Sciences and then tries the local specialty, Pinxtos at a Tapas Bar and enjoys Valencia’s laidback charms at El Cabanyal Beach. She also encounters the city’s strong Catholic roots at Cathedral de Valencia, the alleged home of the Holy Grail used by Christ at the Last Supper.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Alex visits an art museum and a vibrant market, dines in the world's oldest restaurant and explores the city on a segway ride, in Madrid.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Food Guide Salzburg, Austria
programme.desc: Salzburg, boasts a culinary scene as sensational as Mozart, the composer who was born here. Chef Joe Remblance enjoys some of its celebrated dishes.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Timeless Tamil Nadu Kodaikanal, India
programme.desc: Kodaikanal - the name means “The Gift of the Forest”. True to its name, the cozy hill station nestled in Tamil Nadu’s Palani Hills is captivating with its verdant hills, cascading waterfalls, and postcard-perfect lakes. Alex is truly astonished, however, when she stumbles onto an observatory here that has been tracking solar activity for around 115 years!

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Xp Guide Kutna Hora, Czech Republic
programme.desc: The medieval treasury of Czech kings, Kutná Hora owes its prominence to its mines. In fact, the richness of the city’s silver mines was what saw it declared a royal city and made the seat of the Bohemian Royal Mint. As Rohan visits the city’s significant monuments such as a cathedral dedicated to the patron saint of all miners and the erstwhile central mint of the country, he finds out interesting stories about its mining and minting history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Relive the glories of Irish aristocracy as if no time has gone by, in the castles of Ireland. Relish the quaintness of laidback Irish towns.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 City Breaks Bundi, India
programme.desc: From stunning palaces to ornate stepwells, Asmita finds herself soaking in the romance of Bundi, a charming 14th century town in Rajasthan.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: In Valencia, Alex visits Bioparc, Mercado Central and the former silk exchange. She also tries delectable tapas and local fare.

programme.title: The Food Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Food Guide Manchester, England
programme.desc: The dining scene in Manchester has changed considerably over the last 20 years. Stuffy fine dining places have been replaced with street food and flavours from across the globe. Joe Remblance explores this cosmopolitan approach that has seeped into Manchester’s culinary scene though European dishes such as Black Pudding and Tzaziki, Asian dishes such as Chicken Curry and innovative dishes such as a fried chicken waffle pizza and deep-fried Cadbury Crème Eggs.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Timeless Tamil Nadu Madurai, India
programme.desc: During her travels across Tamil Nadu, Alex finally reaches one of India’s most famous pilgrimage sites – Madurai. She pays her respects at the nerve center of the city – the Meenakshi Amman Temple. Her exploration of Madurai reveals to her, however, that there is another, rather delightful side to this revered city.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: The abundant natural and man-made wonders of Norway tell stories of its long and rich history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Lose yourself amidst the spectacular landscapes of Northern Ireland. Witness the miraculous resurfacing of Belfast.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Great World Hotels Six Senses (ENG)
programme.desc: Surrounded by turquoise waters, pristine beaches and lush tropical greenery, Koh Samui offers Elisha the perfect blend of serenity and luxury.

programme.title: Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharaja's Express
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr. & Mrs. Roy on the Maharajas' Express Ep 1
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi are on the Maharajas’ Express. Their first destination is Udaipur, where they bump into an old friend who knows all their secrets.

programme.title: Timeless Tamil Nadu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Timeless Tamil Nadu Karaikudi, India
programme.desc: A town defined by medieval grandeur, Karaikudi transports Alex to the era when affluent Chettiar merchants built splendid mansions as a status symbol. At one of these mansions, the secrets of the Chettinad cuisine, heavy on meat and heat, begin to unfold.

programme.title: Xplore Spain
programme.desc: Exploring more of Valencia, Alex visits Spain's oldest stadium, a bullfighting ring and Europe's largest marine aquarium, and she learns flamenco.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Great World Hotels Le Telfair Heritage, Mauritius
programme.desc: An invigorating body massage, fresh seafood with rum, kayaking - Freishia enjoys finding out the ways in which Mauritius pampers its visitors.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: The Lamborghini Huracan is brutal. Its V10 naturally aspirated engine produces 610 hp and catapults the Italian fighting bull from 0 to 100 km/h in 3.1 seconds. But some people think that that's not enough power.

programme.title: Supercars

programme.title: SURF: WSL Championship Tour 2025 Australia – Wrap Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SURF: WSL Championship Tour 2025 Australia – Wrap Show
programme.desc: Who takes the crown, and who faces defeat? The team dives deep into the Margaret River Pro, where the mid-year cut shakes up the season. Every heat brings surprises and the rivalries intensify.

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 ACTION: For Reals – Legendary Red Bull Moments
programme.desc: Red Bull athletes snowboard in deserts, race rally cars on frozen lakes, race soapboxes and skydive with motocross bikes. For them, it’s just all part of a wild day of action.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 ACTION: Red Bull Soapbox Race – Crazy Obstacle Courses
programme.desc: Lisbon’s steep hills set the stage for teams racing their wild themed homemade cars. Catch them soaring down hills for big thrills. Don’t miss the excitement and fun in this wild event!

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 ACTION: Red Bull Soapbox Race – Crazy Obstacle Courses
programme.desc: Johannesburg’s most creative teams push their limits as they race down winding, challenging courses on wacky homemade themed cars. Each team aims to outsmart and outpace the rest!

programme.title: For Reals
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 ACTION: For Reals – Legendary Red Bull Moments
programme.desc: Breaking world records is just another day for Red Bull athletes! Watch Felix Baumgartner jump from space, 65 women skydive together, and a BMX rider conquer the world’s biggest loop!

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E01 CLIMBING: Reel Rock – Pure Thrills and Defying Limits
programme.desc: Part One: a climbing star teams up to tackle Mallorca’s best deep-water soloing routes. They face towering cliffs, but their journey pushes limits and reveals the raw beauty of this thrilling sport.

programme.title: Reel Rock
programme.sub-title: S10 : E02 CLIMBING: Reel Rock – Pure Thrills and Defying Limits
programme.desc: Part two: the team discovers that climbing solo is as much a mental challenge as a physical one. To conquer the toughest routes, they must confront their fears head-on.

programme.title: ABC of...
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 ACTION: ABC of… Surfing
programme.desc: Tracing the roots of surfing from ancient traditions to the sport it is today. It is a lifestyle, an expression of freedom, connection to nature and relentless pursuit of the perfect wave.

programme.title: SURF: Momentum – A New Era and a New Star
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SURF: Momentum – A New Era and a New Star
programme.desc: Featuring pioneers who helped shape modern surfing, this film captures the very first moves that sparked the start of a new era, where style, skill and creativity changed the sport forever.

programme.title: SURF: Momentum II – The Next Step
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 SURF: Momentum II – The Next Step
programme.desc: After Momentum I, the stakes get higher with more action, bigger tricks, and fresh talent hitting the waves. Watch the next generation of surfers tear through epic sections with style and power.

programme.title: ABC of...
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 ACTION: ABC of… Drifting
programme.desc: An expert driver explains the wild world of drifting. Learn the rules, meet the people and discover why this sport is all about speed, style, smoke and skill. Get ready for an exciting ride!

programme.title: Red Bull Shay’ iMoto 2024 Highlights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Red Bull Shay’ iMoto 2024 Highlights
programme.desc: Watch eight of South Africa's top spinners compete at Red Bull Shay'iMoto 2024 and see why this thrilling sport has become the country's biggest motorsport. Don’t miss the intense action!

programme.title: LIVE: Drift Masters Latvia Top 16 – MOTORSPORT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 LIVE: Drift Masters Latvia Top 16 – MOTORSPORT
programme.desc: Drifting speed meets skill at the fastest track of the year. Tensions rise and engines roar as these elite drivers battle tight corners and high speeds in a race where every inch counts.

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.title: How This Troubled Car Drove F1's Greatest Qualifying Lap
programme.desc: From Senna to Schumacher to Hamilton, there are some great qualifiers in Formula 1, but who exactly has had the best qualifying lap in F1 history? In this episode of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner picks out F1’s greatest qualifying laps.

programme.title: How Controversy at Imola Changed F1 Forever
programme.desc: Imola kicks off the European Formula 1 season in 2022 - the track has a rich history, but it’s also one filled with drama, controversy and tragedy – from intra-team fights to battles for the control of the sport and one of motorsport’s worst weekends. In the latest of our new "A Short View Back to the Past" series, Autosport's Chief Editor Kevin Turner takes a look at some of the most important moments in Imola’s rollercoaster story.

programme.title: The fastest F1 cars to never win a championship
programme.desc: Some cars obliterate the F1 field but once in a while, luck runs out and even the fastest cars and drivers can't win. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner reveals F1’s fastest failures.

programme.title: The Valentino Rossi Story
programme.desc: An extraordinary personality, global popularity, legendary victory celebrations, and nine motorcycle world championship titles - those are the words to describe Valentino Rossi.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic 2025
programme.desc: Step back in time at Le Mans Classic, where we meet legendary race drivers and passionate car collectors to explore the enduring legacy of vintage machines. From the roaring icons of 1923 to the sleek speedsters of the ’90s, experience the full spectrum of historic racing — on and off the track.

programme.title: Oscar Piastri Exclusive: From Rookie to F1 Title Contender in His Own Words
programme.desc: Oscar Piastri has a nine-point lead in the 2025 Formula 1 championship over team-mate Lando Norris, following the first 14 races of the season. In an exclusive chat with Autosport, hosted at McLaren's Technology Centre, the Australian broke down the key details of his season so far. He picks the races that have been the highlights of this year, reveals the early pros and cons of McLaren's dominant MCL39 chassis, and how he plans to approach the remaining 10 races of the season. Piastri also explains where he feels he's made the greatest strides since joining F1 in 2023, and how his growing stature and confidence in his driving is helping him in the races. He also reveals what its like...

programme.title: First Shakedown for the GMR-001 Hypercar
programme.desc: Genesis Magma Racing has completed the first shakedown of the GMR-001 Hypercar, a major step in the team’s development programme ahead of its competitive debut in the 2026 FIA World Endurance Championship. Appearing in bare carbon fibre, the first of three planned development chassis ran for the first time with drivers Andre Lotterer and Pipo Derani behind the wheel. The milestone followed months of design, engineering, and preparation, bringing together the work of Genesis Magma Racing’s technical team and chassis partner ORECA. The session focused on checking the mechanical and electrical systems, validating the installation of the engine, hybrid system, and gearbox, and completing...

programme.title: World's Greatest F1 cars
programme.desc: Alfa Romeo, Benetton, Brabham, BRM, Cooper, Ferrari, Lancia, Lotus, Maserati, Matra, McLaren, Mercedes Benz, Tyrrell, Vanwall and Williams. It is these marques which we pay tribute to in this unique overview of the evolution of the Grand Prix car.

programme.title: Volkswagen ID.R: Nordschleife Record
programme.desc: Go on a journey with Volkswagen as they aim to break the lap record on the Nordschleife circuit, go behind the scenes with interviews from Hans-Joachim Stuck and Romain Dumas

He picks the races that have been the highlights of this year, reveals the early pros and cons of McLaren's dominant MCL39 chassis, and how he plans to approach the remaining 10 races of the season. Piastri also explains where he feels he's made the greatest strides since joining F1 in 2023, and how his growing stature and confidence in his driving is helping him in the races. He also reveals what its like...

programme.title: First Shakedown for the GMR-001 Hypercar
programme.desc: Genesis Magma Racing has completed the first shakedown of the GMR-001 Hypercar, a major step in the team’s development programme ahead of its competitive debut in the 2026 FIA World Endurance Championship. Appearing in bare carbon fibre, the first of three planned development chassis ran for the first time with drivers Andre Lotterer and Pipo Derani behind the wheel. The milestone followed months of design, engineering, and preparation, bringing together the work of Genesis Magma Racing’s technical team and chassis partner ORECA. The session focused on checking the mechanical and electrical systems, validating the installation of the engine, hybrid system, and gearbox, and completing...

programme.title: World's Greatest F1 cars
programme.desc: Alfa Romeo, Benetton, Brabham, BRM, Cooper, Ferrari, Lancia, Lotus, Maserati, Matra, McLaren, Mercedes Benz, Tyrrell, Vanwall and Williams. It is these marques which we pay tribute to in this unique overview of the evolution of the Grand Prix car.

programme.title: Volkswagen ID.R: Nordschleife Record
programme.desc: Go on a journey with Volkswagen as they aim to break the lap record on the Nordschleife circuit, go behind the scenes with interviews from Hans-Joachim Stuck and Romain Dumas

programme.title: BRC 2025 - Round 4: Rallye De Wallonie
programme.desc: What a denouement. After Cédric Cherain dominated the race with the Porsche 992 Rally GT, the car suddenly stopped briefly on the Naninne dirt track due to an electronic fault. lost 2 minutes and Jos Verstappen did not miss the opportunity to score his third win of the season.

programme.title: How This Troubled Car Drove F1's Greatest Qualifying Lap
programme.desc: From Senna to Schumacher to Hamilton, there are some great qualifiers in Formula 1, but who exactly has had the best qualifying lap in F1 history? In this episode of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner picks out F1’s greatest qualifying laps.

programme.title: How Controversy at Imola Changed F1 Forever
programme.desc: Imola kicks off the European Formula 1 season in 2022 - the track has a rich history, but it’s also one filled with drama, controversy and tragedy – from intra-team fights to battles for the control of the sport and one of motorsport’s worst weekends. In the latest of our new "A Short View Back to the Past" series, Autosport's Chief Editor Kevin Turner takes a look at some of the most important moments in Imola’s rollercoaster story.

programme.title: The fastest F1 cars to never win a championship
programme.desc: Some cars obliterate the F1 field but once in a while, luck runs out and even the fastest cars and drivers can't win. In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner reveals F1’s fastest failures.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 2
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2
programme.desc: Welcome from WES Round 1 and 2 in Trentino, Alto Garda, for the UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Season Opener. First time ever in the astonishing Dolomites mountain area in northern Italy, well-known for its tradition in e-biking, MTB and cyclo-tourism.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 & 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Prolog
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: VANORA Engadinwind by DAKINE - Racing
programme.desc: For almost two weeks, Lake Silvaplana in the beautiful Engadine will be the meeting point for the international windsurfing elite. With more than 300 participants from over 30 countries worldwide, the Engandinwind is the largest windsurf foil event of all time.

programme.title: E-Bike Festival Verbier 2020
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival is taking place in Val de Bagnes for the second time this summer! 4 days dedicated to e-biking! With 5 different activities on offer: E-Bike Test, Rando Gourmande, Discovery Trails, E-Tour du Val de Bagnes or Bosch E-MTB Challenge.

programme.title: VANORA Engadinwind by DAKINE - Foiling
programme.desc: For almost two weeks, Lake Silvaplana in the beautiful Engadin will be the meeting point for the international windsurfing elite. With more than 300 participants from over 30 countries worldwide, the Engandinwind is the largest windsurf foil event of all time.

programme.title: Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 - Live delayed (Vert/Bowl/Street) Part 4
programme.desc: The Mystic Sk8 Cup 2025 celebrates its 30th anniversary at the legendary Štvanice Island Skatepark. This international skateboarding event welcomes over 180 riders from all over the world to compete in the street, bowl and vert disciplines.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 1
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 2
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #32: Epic Series - Andorra Epic
programme.desc: The Andorra Epic took place from July 15 to 18, 2025, in the breathtaking Pyrenees. Over four days, riders covered 160 km and 5,000 meters of elevation gain. The event offered world-class mountain biking in the unique atmosphere of Andorra's alpine villages.

programme.title: Outdoorsportsteam - Stikine River & Place of Happiness
programme.desc: Outdoor Sports Team 2014:Stikine River: Kayaking the Grand Canyon of the Stikine River (British Columbia, CAN / Alaskan Panhandle, USA) A place of happiness: Athletes Mayan Smith-Gobat (NZL) and Ben Rueck (USA) explore the highest monolith in Brazil.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Dakhla (MAR) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 is coming to Dakhla, bringing the best wingfoilers in the world to this Moroccan paradise. With its reliable winds and breathtaking landscapes, Dakhla offers the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Mammut Swiss Irontrail 2013
programme.desc: The spectacular Swiss Alpine region of Graubünden is the setting for one of the toughest ultra trail races in Europe. This event truly embodies the essence of mountain running with breathtaking views - this is the Swiss Irontrail!

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 1
programme.desc: Anniversary base camp / Jungfraujoch (Switzerland)On 3 August 2011, exactly 200 years after the first ascent, the Swiss mountain sports outfitter Mammut will be organizing the biggest summit project in the history of mountaineering on the “Top of Europe”...

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 3 - Cerro Kishtwar
programme.desc: Mammut 150 Peaks Project: Cerro KishtwarKashmir, India, holds some of the world’s most spectacular and mystical mountains. Now with special permissions, an European team will attempt to climb the most aesthetic one of all, Cerro Kishtwar.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Final Stage
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France
programme.desc: GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup France - Dunkerque (FRA)Welcome to World of Freesports…and Bienvenue to France. The famous beaches of the french Harbour-city are once again home to GKA Kitesurfers. This Episode we will have a look at happend there on and of the water.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix
programme.desc: October 1st - 4th, 2020, In Lonato, Italy, the world's leading concentration camp gear kart racers will strive for glory and honor to win the ultimate award - the title of World Champion.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships
programme.desc: The world championship for karting in the OK direct drive category for junior and senior racers is finally upon us, as the field descends on Kartodromo Algarve in Portimao, Portugal, just two weeks after Formula One returned to this incredible country.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #33: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Erzincan (TUR)
programme.desc: The second round of the Downhill Skateboarding World Championship took place under sunny skies high up on Mount Ergan Dağı in Erzincan, Turkey. This was the third visit to the 3 km long track, often referred to as the most difficult in the world.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Stop #04 AUT
programme.desc: Fieberbrunn, (AUT), March 14th 2022The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn. It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers through 650 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 000m of climbing.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 4 - Italy & Norway
programme.desc: 150 summit projectTwo speed flyers were the first to climb Mount Etna (ITA) with paragliders and skis. Another exciting ski tour was undertaken by Scandinavian sportswomen who climbed Geitgaljen in the Lofoten Islands (NOR) in April 2012.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 5 - Patagonia,Alaska & Pakistan
programme.desc: Stephan Siegrist climbs all the summits of the Cerro Torre group in Patagonia / The Ataraxia Mammut Proteam wanted to climb Mt. Marcus Baker with kitesupport in Alaska / David Lama intends to climb the 6,251 meter peak of Trango Tower in Pakistan

programme.title: Kald Sòl
programme.desc: The film sheds light on the surprising resources of cold countries, and on the search for waves guided by climatic uncertainties. Samuel Redon, a young professional surfer accustomed to warm-water surfing, is about to discover a whole new world of surfing.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 1
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: World Air Games 2015 - Part 2
programme.desc: The FAI World Air Games are the most important international multi-discipline air sports event in which the best athletes in the world take part. There will be 11 sports and 24 disciplines. More than 1000 athletes, crews and officials will take part.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the world's largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.desc: Welcome to WES rounds 3 and 4 of the UCI E-Mountainbike Cross-Country World Cup presented by Schwalbe. We are in Bielstein, Germany, for the second year in a row and the Bielstein Forest Course is the venue for this event and one of Europe's oldest motocross circuits.

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Robbie Maddison
programme.desc: Robbie Maddison began his career competing in national motocross competitions. On New Year's Eve 2007, the 40th anniversary of Evel Knievel's legendary jump over the Caesar's Palace fountain, the Australian broke the world record in the bicycle long jump with his bicycle

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (OK/OKJ)
programme.desc: After three consecutive Finals in wet conditions between 2019 and 2021, the Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Champion-ship - OK & OK-Junior saw good weather and high temperatures for the season over the weekend.

programme.desc: The Natural Selection Tour 2022 features the world’s greatest men and women snowboarders competing on the planet’s most epic terrain in all-time conditions. The Tour’s mission is to inspire people to forge a deeper bond with Mother Nature.

programme.desc: Today we present you the Highlights of the Open Faces Event, the chance for riders to qualify for the well-known Freeride World Tour. Junior riders as well as adults have the opportunity to show their skill to the judges.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour is looking forward to returning to the Cape Verdean island of Sal to open the 2024 season with the discipline of kite surfing. In February, the best kite-surfing athletes will compete against each other at the Kite-Surf World Cup

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Kite Park League World Championships – Hood River (USA) – Best Of
programme.desc: The moment many people have been waiting for is finally here - one of the biggest kiteboarding events. While there are many great kiteboarding locations around the globe, perhaps one of the most historic is Hood River, Oregon, the birthplace of parkriding.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, which brings together the best kitesurfers in the world. Athletes from all over the world will compete for the title and show impressive skills in surfing and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2025 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: The Trans Madeira combines the best that Madeira Island and Porto Santo have to offer with six days of racing in the most diverse terrain in the world! With the addition of a new island, you can expect 250km of riding and more than 30 special stages

programme.title: 2025 WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup Cheile Grădiștei Round
programme.desc: The WES UCI E-MTB XC World Cup 2025 - Cheile Grădiștei Round marks the exciting start to the season of the world's leading e-mountain bike series. Riders from all over the world will be battling for the first points in the championship standings

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2025 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: The Trans Madeira combines the best that Madeira Island and Porto Santo have to offer with six days of racing in the most diverse terrain in the world! With the addition of a new island, you can expect 250km of riding and more than 30 special stages

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024
programme.desc: With the aim of bringing cycling to as many people as possible in France, CIC has become a title partner of the Roc d'Azur, Europe's leading mountain bike event, which attracts almost 100,000 enthusiasts, participants and aficionados every year!

programme.title: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024
programme.desc: World’s biggest long-distance triathlon: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024July 7th, 2024The world’s best athletes will conquer the traditional triathlon distance of 3.8 km swimming, 180 km cycling and 42.2 km running through the district of Roth in Bavaria, Germany.

programme.title: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024
programme.desc: The LAAX Highline World Championships 2024 will take place from July 17th to 21st in Laax, Switzerland, at the legendary GALAAXY on the summit of Crap Sogn Gion (2252m). The competition consists of two disciplines: Freestyle and Speed Highline.

programme.title: Defender GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 – Sylt (GER) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #33: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Erzincan (TUR)
programme.desc: The second round of the Downhill Skateboarding World Championship took place under sunny skies high up on Mount Ergan Dağı in Erzincan, Turkey. This was the third visit to the 3 km long track, often referred to as the most difficult in the world.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2021 - Stage 7
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world's premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year and takes ambitious amateur and professional mountain bikers from all over the world over 650 untamed kilometres through pristine landscapes.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #4 Grand Finale - Xtreme Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: Due to snow conditions, athletes in all categories started at 3,020m (instead of 3,300m), but that certainly didn’t stop them lighting up the lookers-right of the Bec des Rosses - leaving judges and viewers in awe and wanting more.

programme.title: Audi Nines - Nothing Quite Like It
programme.desc: “Nothing Quite Like It” explores the question of why these athletes dare to jump so high. This documentary explores why athletes, regardless of gender or discipline, keep coming back year after year.

programme.title: Winter Games Obsidian - Big Air
programme.desc: Winter Games NZ is the largest snow sports event in the southern hemisphere. Traditionally, it welcomes the world's best skiers and snowboarders to take part in the opening of the FIS Park and Pipe World Cup season and The North Face Frontier.

programme.title: Cape Pioneer Finals - MTB Stage Race - Oudtshoorn (RSA)
programme.desc: Mossel Bay on the Eastern Cape Coast will host the race for the first three nights... Steep road climbs, a rocky cliff path and a boardwalk make for a fast, fun day...

programme.title: Greenlandic
programme.desc: Info not available

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2016 - The Heroes
programme.desc: Every year since 2008, the world's best freeride skiers and snowboarders have competed for the world championship title in the Freeride World Tour. Thanks to the top sporting performances, the tour has become an integral part of the international winter sports calendar.

programme.title: North Face Expedition 2011 - Gasherbrum II
programme.desc: Winter ascent of an eight-thousander in Pakistan's Karakoram Mountains: three extreme mountaineers survived this adventure with the successful historic first ascent of Gasherbrum II (8,034 m) in winter.

programme.title: Iceland Traverse - Mountain Bike Expedition - Iceland
programme.desc: Hans Rey and Steve Peat want to go through Iceland by mountain bike. Unlike touring bikers, they want to explore the best single trails. They developed a plan to conquer the deep rivers, snow fields and sandy sections along the way.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #33: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Erzincan (TUR)
programme.desc: The second round of the Downhill Skateboarding World Championship took place under sunny skies high up on Mount Ergan Dağı in Erzincan, Turkey. This was the third visit to the 3 km long track, often referred to as the most difficult in the world.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - BMX Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2022
programme.desc: Neusiedl am See, (AUT), April 27th to May 1st, 2022With 9 events on the calendar across Europe and South America, it is getting excited for Europe’s and America’s best freestyle windsurfing action!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 4 + 5
programme.desc: In today´s episode we go Down Under to the extrem water athletes in Australia. We´re oing to find out, who will win the Round 4 and 5 of the V8 Superboats Championship 2021.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary - Part 2
programme.desc: Today we will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean. We´ll visit some of the most terrifying and beautiful waves around the globe.

programme.title: WES E-MTB World Cup
programme.desc: In today´s episode we check out the first and second round of the World E-Bike Series 2022 in Monaco and Bologna, Italy. But who can dominate the men´s and the women´s Races? Let´s go!

programme.title: Catch the Moment - Profile Kassia Meador
programme.desc: “Catch the Moment” portrays athletes from all over the world such as American longboard surfer Kassia Meador. She is considered one of the most stylish professional longboarders, but has also made a name for herself as a photographer

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 2
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: WOF 2025 #33: World Downhill Skateboarding Championships - Erzincan (TUR)
programme.desc: The second round of the Downhill Skateboarding World Championship took place under sunny skies high up on Mount Ergan Dağı in Erzincan, Turkey. This was the third visit to the 3 km long track, often referred to as the most difficult in the world.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: MIT100 - Triathlon Mauritius
programme.desc: The "MIT100 - Mauritius International Triathlon" is a prestigious annual triathlon event held in Mauritius. It attracts athletes from around the world, offering a challenging course with a 1.8 km swim, a 55 km bike ride, and a 12 km run.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship #1
programme.desc: Today we´re joining the World Downhill Skateboarding & Luge Championship in Erzincan, Turkey. Nestled in the heart of Eastern Anatolia, Erzincan’s breathtaking landscapes provide a stunning backdrop for this adrenaline-fueled competition.

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: ON Surf
programme.desc: ON Surf - A Collection of Italian Surf Movie Classics. Starring the most inspiring surfers around the globe including Leah Dawson, Ale Ponzanelli and many more.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S07 : E16 SCL 2021 Season 7, Episode 16, World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: What a day ahead of us here in Alanya, just a handful of events to go before we find out who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League in 2021. These are the world finals, and all the big names are in the house. With just 3 events to go - who will take the crown of World Champion 2021 and be the STRONGEST?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E01 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 1, Finland Stage 1
programme.desc: We are back, after a short break it feels like we never even left. We’re here in Vaasa - Finland kicking off 2022 new world series. If you are watching at home, just like these people, you’re in the right place. Because this is a special edition world record breaker. The only question left today, is to see how many new world records will be set so stay tuned.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E02 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 2, Holland Part 1
programme.desc: We are here in Doetinchem – Holland, for Stage 2 and 3 in the hottest day of the year. 40-degree heat, these boys have to work harder than they ever have. The sun is going to be beating down, they’re going to be sweating, hydration is going to be key today. I also reckon they’re all going to be wearing their sunglasses. Let’s see which shady looking character wins.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E03 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 3, Holland Part 2
programme.desc: So there you have it. The next day, 3 more events in 40 Degrees heat. We’ve got Gavin coming into day 2 leading the pack. Kelvin De Ruiter our world champion struggling a little bit at the moment, but Yoke Race, Conan’s Wheel and then Stones to finish. There is a lot to be played for here, so stay tuned to see if Gavin can take the lead and beat Kelvin overall.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E04 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 4, Serbia Part 1
programme.desc: We’re in the Serbian city of Novi kozarci, for the next stage in the world series. And what a fantastic line up we have for you again. But it is going to be one of the hottest stages yet. A Strongman competition in 44-degree heat. It will be a real challenge for these athletes to finish this event. From all over the world the strongmen came here for the title! Welcome to the heat hell in Serbia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E05 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 5, Serbia Part 2
programme.desc: Welcome to day 2 in Serbia, and its another baking hot one. We are in Kikinda today! We’ve got three more gruelling events for our athletes. Sami Ahola is leading the pack, so can he be the first Finnish athlete to take an SCL title. Stay tuned to find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E06 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 6, Joensuu Part 1
programme.desc: In this competition, we have our athletes paired up. They’re going to have to take on each event together, having to factor in each other’s strengths and possibly weaknesses. Can the men who normally work alone, share their powers as a duo? Let’s find out!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E07 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 7, Joensuu Part 2
programme.desc: Day 2 of the famous Team World championship here in Finland- Joensuu. Welcome to the final day of the world’s strongest team event. The race to be the best team in the world is coming to its crowing point. All is still wide open for any of these to take the title. Who is going to win? Will team Latvia keep their World Title or maybe Finland can attach them? Keep watching and we’ll find out.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E08 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 8, Esposende
programme.desc: Welcome back to Strongman Champions League for another stage of the 2022 world tour. We’re in Esposende - Portugal in this beautiful setting next to the beach in front of a packed crowd with some of the strongest men the world has to offer. With a real Porsche deadlift and many other crazy stuff. So, lets get this show started.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E09 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 9, Great Britain
programme.desc: Hello and welcome in Gloucester, UK. The world tour hasn’t been here for what feels like forever. And now for the first time in the Mekka of Strongman, the SCL World series will crown a great Champion with the SCL Title. It will be full with special wooden events, and a great winner! So ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, brace yourselves because I present to you strongman champions league UK.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 10, Poland Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland the home of Legends Mariusz Pudzianowkski and Krzystof Radzikowski. Who will grab the title here in holiday resort Sopot, on the great Balrtic Sea with 6 events and 12 athlets in the mix!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E11 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 11, Poland Part 2
programme.desc: We are in Sopot, Poland, after 3 events the Polish Strongman Oskar Ziolkowski is Leading. Kelvin, Travis and Aivars are coming up and will try to beat him, but will Oskar take his first title ever?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E12 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 12, Bosnia
programme.desc: it’s been a long time since the world series held a championship here in Sarajevo. Let’s see what test of strength this destination holds for our athletes. And what fantastic athletes are here again in Stage 12 of the SCL World Series. The strongman champions league Bosnia is another iconic Strongman event with the return of Rongo Keen from Australia and Portugal winner 2022 George Sulaiman.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E13 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 13, Romania
programme.desc: Welcome to Sibiu in Romania. It’s an important day for some of these athletes, because four of them have a real chance of getting into our all-exclusive world finals. There’s only one more stage after this to get those all-important extra points. So, there’s going to be some fireworks, who will take the title here and who will qualify for the World Finals?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E14 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 14, Gibraltar
programme.desc: This is it the last show before the world final. These guys have really got to fight for the points now, this is going to be action packed, whilst these guys fight it out all day.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E15 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 15, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: We are in Alanya, on Turkey’s south-coast for the final stop at the end of a mammoth season of Strongman Champions League. Here in the sunshine, we’ll finally crown our world champion and what a place Alanya is. You could not ask for a better setting. After months of hard-work, if not years for some of these lads, we find out who will take the world title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S08 : E16 SCL 2022 Season 8, Episode 16, Turkey Part 1
programme.desc: Welcome, to day two of the strongman champions league 2022 finals here in Alanya, Turkey. It’s all up for grabs now, everyone is fighting for the world title belt. This is an epic episode where we finally crown the World champion of 2022.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E01 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 1 - Finland
programme.desc: Welcome to the 2023 Strongman Champions League in Vaasa, Finland! This year’s event introduces a knockout format with 6 intense events over 90 minutes, ending in a unique deadlift face-off with boats.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E02 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 2 - Serbia
programme.desc: Stage 2 of the Strongman Champions League 2023 is set in Zrenjanin, Serbia. This exciting event features 5 challenging contests, including a superhuman Yoke race. As the SCL World Series Tour continues, athletes will battle it out to claim the yellow leader’s position for the season. Don’t miss this incredible stage of strength and endurance!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E03 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 3 - Finland Teams World
programme.desc: The World’s Strongest Team will be crowned in this edition of SCL, here in Kalajoki-Finland we’ve picked some of the best in the business, teamed them up, and they’ll be going all out against each other. It’s now no longer about being a lonely wolf, but more about the pack mentality. It is a competition over 7 events, including a Big 2-man Log lift and heavy deadlift. Let’s start the action.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E04 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 4 - Holland
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League in Holland at the Dru Factory in ULFT. A great location for a spectacular battle with 14 Athletes over 3 events! The first 3 events in this episode are Truckpull/ Superyoke and Farmerswalk, with 2 massive logs of 150 kg in their hands. So, join us for the show of strength, the place of power, it’s the circus of the extreme.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E05 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 5 - Holland 2023
programme.desc: Ladies and gentleman, boys and girls, strongman fans across the world, we are back for SCL Holland part two. Get ready because it’s about to get heavy. The Strongman Champions League in Holland, continues with the last 3 events, here at the Dru Factory in ULFT. The events in this episode are the Viking Press, Wheel Flip and the Atlas Stones, with 180 kg in the end.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E06 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 6 - World's Strongest Latino
programme.desc: For the first time ever, the World’s Strongest Latino competition has begun. This two-day event in Porto, Portugal, features 20 athletes from around the world competing in 8 events. After 4 grueling events, the top 12 will advance to the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E07 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 7 - Finland World Record Breakers
programme.desc: Strongman Champions League World Record Breakers 2023 starts with a 25-ton snow plow! Crazy machines are pulled and pushed, with many kilograms moved. A few new world records are set in this competition.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E08 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 8 - Portugal
programme.desc: We have returned to the powerhouse of Portugal for an edge-of-your-seat galactic battle. If all the planets collided at once, it wouldn’t compare to the bang of this show. Get ready for the battle of the beasts; it’s the heaviest show in the universe, the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E09 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 9 - England
programme.desc: SCL UK has landed in Gloucester it is workout war fitness for the ferocious, it’s going to be a a battle of the brutal, a rampage of the roofless. This is going to be a massacre of the muscles. You know it by now, but just in case you don’t, this is strongman champions league.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E10 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 10 - World's Strongest Viking
programme.desc: On the menu this week it’s medieval madness, we’ve come back to the middle ages to test our noble men through a muscle gaining of events. They are hoping and we are hoping that one will survive to take the title of the world’s strongest Viking. The official World's Strongest Viking is this time in Finland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: This week is a good one, can you feel the energy? Sit still, just look at me and try and feel the energy, because I can tell you, the atmosphere here is electric, it’s explosive, there is a pure elemental force going through these athletes' veins. I’m shaking because it’s Poland, it’s powerful, it’s strongman champions league, and you know what I'm going to say, get ready because it’s about to get heavy.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: SCL Poland part 2 - Who will win the title in Poland and take 25 points for the world ranking. It is very exciting on the top, in part 1 between Poland and Latvia. Another great episode with super strongman events such as: Bag Toss Medley, Log Lift Reps and the Powerstairs. Also an interview with Mateusz Kieloszkowski, the all time favorite champion from Poland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.desc: It’s time to show our strength and gain respect from the gods of Olympus. Our gladiators have many events set out by no other than Hercules himself. The coliseum is ready here on this mythological island of Cyprus, so we have landed in Limassol were again 12 Top Strongmen are battling for the title and ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E14 SCL 2023 Season 9, Stage 14 - South Africa
programme.desc: The only and official world championship Truckpulling for its 10th year, again at the Strongman Champions league. With the 3 times Worldchampion Kelvin de Ruiter – defending his title. This championship has trucks in all shapes and sizes which is a lot like our athletes, there all different pay loads, but does the biggest win or is it the strongest.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E15 Stage 15 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Years and years of determination has brought us here today, when all the walls felt like they were caving in perseverance. When their bodies were screaming, hurting, shouting stop, beneath. These are the things which make up a man, these are the things that bring you world finalists. This episode they fight for the greatest title of all, they fight to put their names in the history books forever.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S09 : E16 Stage 16 - SCL World Finals Bosnia
programme.desc: Part 2 of the World Finals of the Strongman Champions League tour 2023 at the Sarajevo Centar Skenderija in Bosnia. 3 Events was done already and amazing results have been set. Who will be the new World champion? Find out here, who, after 16 stages, will be crowned World Champion 2023.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 10, Hungary

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 11, Zambia
programme.desc: The first ever SCL in Zambia! The athletes get to take in some of the stunning sights and go on to do events such as Tyre Flip and Log Lift

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 12, Romania
programme.desc: The competition moves to Romania and for the first time this season the athletes compete in rainy conditions which make the events even tougher

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 13, Lithunia
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition takes place in Lithunia and world records are once again broken!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 14, Estonia
programme.desc: Episode 14 takes place in Estonia where drama and world records will be seen again

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 15, Malaysia (World Finals Part 1)
programme.desc: Taking place over 2 days in Malaysia, this is part 1 of the world finals of Strongman Champions League!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 SCL 2014 Season 1, Episode 16, Malaysia (World Finals Part 2)
programme.desc: Who will be the winner of Strongman Champions League - we find out who is crowned as world champion today in the second part of the final epsiode

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania
