programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The undisputed heavyweight king of kickboxing will be decided in the main event as long reigning champion Rico Verhoeven (60-10, 20 KO) goes up against arguably his most dangerous opponent to date in interim-heavyweight champ Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (25-2-1, 13 KO). Middleweight champ Donovan Wisse (19-1, 10 KO) puts his title on the line against number one contender Michael Boapeah (16-3-1, 7 KO). Wisse has looked unstoppable so far during his title run but now he faces an in-form Michael Boapeah who holds a win over the only man to beat Wisse. The welterweight division sees top ranked stars go head-to-head as Hamicha (40-2, 30 KO) takes on Diaguely Camara (24-4-1, 10 KO) and Jay Overmeer...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Endy Semeleer (35-1, 17 KO) will put his GLORY welterweight title on the line against ‘House of GLORY’ winner Anwar Ouled-Chaib (3-0) in the main event. In the co-main event, local fan favourite Nabil Khachab (26-4-1, 4 KO) finally gets his opportunity to enter the GLORY Grand Prix as he goes up against Serbia’s Nikola Filipovic (11-2, 6 KO) in a qualifying fight. Number one ranked Enriko Kehl (52-15-2, 30 KO) will be aiming undeniably book his spot as the next title challenger against champion Tyjani Beztati. The German meets the dangerous Arman Hambaryan (58-8-2, 27 KO) of Armenia.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari will go head-to-head with Estonia’s Uku Jürjendal in a GLORY Grand Prix Qualifier. Middleweight Champ Petchpanomrung will defend his belt against newcomer David Meija. Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Badr Hari will go head-to-head with Estonia’s Uku Jürjendal in a GLORY Grand Prix Qualifier. Middleweight Champ Petchpanomrung will defend his belt against newcomer David Meija. Bulgarias own, Stoyan Koprivlenski, will face off with Romanian Sorin Caliniuc. Also fighting is Heavyweight Levi Rigters and Luis Tavares makes his return.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A huge title fight rematch will take place in the main event as rivals Tiffany ‘Time Bomb’ van Soest (24-6-2, 9 KO) and Sarah Moussaddak (8-3, 1 KO) lock horns once again. The rest of the card is stacked with some exciting names and thrilling fights. French Algerian Nordine Mahieddine (27-15, 12 KO) collides with France’s Abderahmane Coulibaly (58-20-1, 25 KO) in a big heavyweight contest, Germany’s Denis Wosik (37-8-1, 9 KO) meets the super popular Albanian Berjan Peposhi (27-3, 16 KO), former GLORY title challenger Karim Ghajji (103-17-1, 53 KO) returns and squares-off against Serbia’s Nikola Todorovic (26-3, 14 KO), and Iliass Hammouche (32-6, 7 KO) will finally make his much...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: Wah Taj
programme.desc: A farmer, Tukaram, claims that the land on which the Taj Mahal is built belongs to him. The State machinery negotiates with him and decides to give him another piece of land. But this land belongs to an industrialist, who hires a hitman to kill Tukaram. Tukaram survives but the truth that unfolds explains why Tukaram had laid his claim on the land of the magnificent monument.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jaal-the trap
programme.desc: In troubled Kashmir, a terrorist group attempts to free their leader by abducting Anita Choudhary, the Home Minister's daughter. Foiled by her security, they kidnap Ajay's girlfriend, Neha, forcing him to abduct Anita. Ajay, realizing the truth, decides to undo his mistakes and save both Anita and Neha from the terrorists.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E45 Jodha Akbar S3 E45
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E256 This is Fate S1 E256
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E256 Undercover Love S1 E256
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: After nearly six months, the F4 guys have graduated and moved on to university

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di waits to hear the results of F3's meeting with Jun-pyo.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: After treating Jan Di in a harsh manner, Mr. Jung prepares everything so that Jun-Pyo can go see her in Seoul.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jan Di’s family hear about Jun-pyo’s engagement and ask her dejectedly if it’s true.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Ji-hoo can see how hurt Jan Di is by the kiss, and continues to follow her as she walks around in a daze.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo starts seeing Jae-Kyung in a different way.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Woo-bin tries to talk some sense into Yi-jung, who is hell-bent on drinking himself into oblivion.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: At home, Jun-hee thinks back to how her mother interfered in her life.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Yi-jung is waiting outside for Eun-jae, happy to see her until he overhears her phone conversation.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo pleads for Jan Di to tell him not to get married.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Jun-pyo tells Jan Di that he'll protect her but she says that she doesn't want to be protected.

programme.title: Boys Over Flowers
programme.desc: Perhaps feeling it’s time to reveal one truth, Mr. Jung leads Jun-hee to the mystery patient’s bedside.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Cinderella and Four Knights

programme.title: Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Cinderella and Four Knights
programme.desc: CEO Kang offers Eun Ha Won a project to reform his grandsons in exchange for her educational support.

programme.desc: Eun Ha Won starts living in Haneul House with Kang Hyeon Min, Kang Ji Woon, and Kang Seo Woo.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: 10K and Red attend a ceremony for those lost in Altura. Warren, Doc, Citizen Z and George arrive in Pacifica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A team starts its journey transporting the only survivor of the zombie virus from New York to Los Angeles, CA.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After taking refuge in a safe enclave where no weapons are allowed, the team finds itself thrust into a battle for control of the compound against a zombie-worshipping cult.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of shelter and supplies, the team seeks refuge in an all-female compound where men are not allowed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: After finally tracking down Murphy, the group comes across a caravan of survivors transporting victims of the nuclear blast to safety. Along the way, the mission is attacked by "blasters," zombies mutated by the radioactive fallout.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as "The Collector."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Near Roswell, New Mexico, the group encounters a community, led by a woman called Bernadette, which they believe is above a secret underground base that may contain useful equipment.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In Los Angeles, the team drives through the abandoned city to the coordinates of the mobile CDC lab provided by Citizen Z. There, they discover the lab isn't just a lab - it's a submarine.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic "flashback movie," the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: As more people flock to Murphy's new cult, Dr. Merch works on a blend vaccine as well as a booster shot to slow to Murphy's descent into zombiedom.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the others inspect Murphytown and realize they are going to need a bigger army to extract Murphy. Warren finds an old ally in El Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: Lucy fights to save Murphy's life, while Warren and the others battle a biologically modified zombie.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.desc: At Mount Weather, the group learns the thumb print of the president is necessary to achieve Warren's goal.

programme.title: Z Nation

programme.title: Za Kilka Dolarów Mniej
programme.desc: Urzędnik bankowy i jego kuzyn, "generał", łączą siły, by wytropić meksykańskiego banitę.

programme.title: Trinity w Eldorado
programme.desc: Po kilku nieudanych próbach oszustwa, Książę Jonatan III i jego wspólnik Sebastian Carter łączą siły z Ringo i jego gangiem, by okraść Meksykanina Eldorado.

programme.title: Mściciel
programme.desc: Clay Hardin chce porzucić odznakę, ale gdy bandyta zabija szeryfa, rusza w pościg. Dołącza do niego łowca nagród i tajemnicza kobieta. Trop prowadzi na terytorium Apaczów, gdzie odkrywają plan sprzedaży broni Indianom.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Joshua - Czarny Jeździec
programme.desc: Joshua, czarnoskóry weteran wojny secesyjnej, wraca do rodzinnego miasta, by odkryć, że jego matka została zamordowana przez biały gang. Zdeterminowany, by wymierzyć sprawiedliwość, staje się łowcą nagród i wyrusza na brutalną, pełną niebezpieczeństw misję zemsty.

programme.title: Kalifornijski szlak
programme.desc: Właściciel saloonu zostaje wrobiony przez wspólnika w napad na dyliżans. By oczyścić swoje imię, wyrusza w desperacką podróż pełną niebezpieczeństw. W tym samym czasie los łączy go z kobietą, która także walczy o przetrwanie. Razem stawiają czoła przeciwnościom na Kalifornijskim szlaku.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 37, 38, 39
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Córka Belle Starr
programme.desc: Bob "Bitter Creek" Yauntis zabija Belle Starr i przejmuje gang. Nowy szeryf Tom Jackson zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o jej śmierć przez jej córkę Rose. Aby oczyścić swoje imię i zyskać jej zaufanie, rusza tropem gangu. Western o zemście, odkupieniu i walce o sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Nieznajomy na koniu
programme.desc: Sędzia Rick Thorne próbuje wymierzyć sprawiedliwość w miasteczku rządzonym przez potężnego ranczera. Aresztuje jego syna za morderstwo i rusza w niebezpieczną podróż, by zapewnić uczciwy proces. Czy uda mu się pokonać korupcję i zyskać zaufanie Amy Lee?

programme.title: Tylko Waleczni
programme.desc: Mało lubiany dowódca kawalerii zostaje przez swój oddział niesprawiedliwie obwiniony za śmierć jednego z oficerów. Musi teraz odkupić winy i udowodnić swoim ludźmi, że się mylili.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Prawo Dana Candiego
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach, tragiczna historia uciekiniera z Saskatchewan Almighty Voice (Gordon Tootoosis), Indianina Cree, którego aresztowano za kradzież państowej własności.

programme.title: Szlak Cariboo
programme.desc: Jim Redfern marzy o ranczu i stadzie bydła. Wyrusza w drogę z przyjaciółmi, ale spotykają Franka Walsha, który ich prześladuje. Po ciężkiej ranie Mike’a Evansa i konflikcie, Redfern musi walczyć o marzenia, gdy odkrywa złoto.

programme.title: Djurado
programme.desc: Djurado to uzbrojony, zawodowy hazardzista. Przyjeżdża on do małego miasteczka Silver Mine, gdzie wda się w walkę z niejakim Tucanem. Djurado zdobędzie połowę miejscowego saloonu, którego druga część należy do Barbary.

programme.title: Requiem dla Gringo
programme.desc: Wyjątkowy eurowestern, którego bohaterem jest astrolog noszący garnitur w panterkę.

programme.title: Umarli nie rzucają cienia
programme.desc: Lazar, bezwzględny łowca nagród, przybywa do górniczego miasteczka, by szantażować wpływowego właściciela kopalni. Śledzi go młody rewolwerowiec z własnym celem. Gdy ich ścieżki się krzyżują, powstaje nieoczekiwany sojusz przeciwko tyranii i chciwości.

programme.title: O jednego dolara za dużo
programme.desc: Hazardzista, strzelec i aktor – trzech różnych przestępców z Dzikiego Zachodu łączy niełatwy sojusz w pogoni za skradzionym majątkiem. Czy ich różnice pozwolą im przetrwać i zdobyć 400 000 dolarów?

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Zwą Mnie Alleluja
programme.desc: Generał Ramirez walczy o rewolucję w Meksyku przeciwko europejskiej dominacji. Wynajmuje Hallelujah, tajemniczego rewolwerowca, by zlikwidował europejskiego cesarza Maksymiliana, przejmując sakiewkę z klejnotami, która miała być przeznaczona na zakup broni.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 40, 41, 42
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec od Stu Krzyży
programme.desc: Na Dzikim Zachodzie ginie pewien Irlandczyk. Jego syn Jimmy wyrusza na poszukiwanie zabójców ojca, ale wpada w zasadzkę i również zostaje zabity.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Na Imię Mi Mallory... M Znaczy Śmierć
programme.desc: Emerytowany pułkownik Harper pragnie udać się na emeryturę na swoje ranczo, ale nikczemny Bart Ambler również interesuje się tą posiadłością.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Poker z Rewolwerami
programme.desc: Po przegraniu wszystkiego w pokera i zaciągnięciu długu, Lucas zgadza się dostarczyć wóz do miasteczka Chamaco za 5000 dolarów zapłaty. Wkrótce wpada w wielkie tarapaty z bandytami, lokalnym bossem miasta i piękną pracownicą saloonu.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Django i Sartana na Zachodzie
programme.desc: Gang bezwzględnych banitów pod wodzą szalonego Czarnego Burta Kellera porywa Jessicę Colby i postanawia uciec do Meksyku. Sprytny łowca nagród Django i świątobliwy rewolwerowiec Sartana łączą siły, by uratować biedaczkę z nikczemnych szponów gangu.

programme.title: Dni Nienawiści
programme.desc: Benson poluje na gang bandytów, którzy zabili jego rodziców, brata i siostry poza jedną - Susy, którą zwyrodnialcy chcą mieć dla siebie!

programme.title: Django... Adiós!
programme.desc: Django jest szeryfem, który zostaje niesłusznie aresztowany za kradzież skrzyni pełnej dolarów, przeznaczonych na budowę szkoły i kościoła w Silver City.

programme.title: Niebezpieczni kompani
programme.desc: Były sierżant Yellowleg ratuje oszusta i planuje napad na bank. Przez przypadek zabija syna tancerki Kit. Postanawia pomóc jej przewieźć ciało przez terytorium Apaczów. W trakcie niebezpiecznej podróży wychodzą na jaw ich prawdziwe intencje i uczucia.

programme.title: Ostatnia Misja
programme.desc: Sławny rewolwerowiec powraca do swojej byłej żony, która chce tylko, aby uratował jej męża szeryfa przed zabiciem przez rewolwerowców chcących uwolnić skazanego więźnia.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Dolary Dla McGregorów
programme.desc: Niejaki Forsythe, łowca głów, używa swojej żony jako przynęty na bandytów. Jeden numer się nie udaje i jego żona ginie. Forsythe wyrusza w pościg za mordercą, ale do pogoni dołącza tajemniczy jeździec...

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja | Odcinki 43, 44, 45
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Wybuchowy Joe
programme.desc: Młody poszukiwacz przygód Jakcpot jest właścicielem jednego z pięciu kawałków złotej bryłki, na której wyryte jest położenie kopalni złota. Z piękną damą do towarzystwa Lulu Belle jako wspólniczką, Jackpot rozpoczyna niebezpieczną przygodę, by odnaleźć pozostałe kawałki.

programme.title: Strzały w Apache Wells
programme.desc: Po latach nieobecności młody mężczyzna wraca na rodzinne ranczo. Na miejscu odkrywa, że gang chce przejąć nie tylko jego ziemię, ale też ukochaną. Zaczyna się walka o to, co najcenniejsze – dom, miłość i sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Z Bogiem, Gringo
programme.desc: Bracia Cris wrobili Gringo w zabójstwo jego brata, przez co trafia do więzienia z przyjacielem. Gdy prawdziwi mordercy uciekają i porywają Carmen, Gringo rusza w pełne niebezpieczeństw przygody, by oczyścić swoje imię i ocalić ukochaną.

programme.title: Powrót Jacka Slade’a
programme.desc: Jack Slade, syn słynnego łowcy nagród, pracuje dla Pinkertona, by rozbić gang rabusiów pociągów. Infiltruje bandę, lecz jego przyjaciel ginie z rąk Suttona. Zdrada i żądza zemsty prowadzą Slade’a do finałowej pułapki, którą wraz z Ryanem zastawia na niebezpiecznych przestępców i ich wspólniczki.

programme.title: Śmierć na Wysokim Wzgórzu
programme.desc: Ważny skok idzie źle, gdy dwaj młodzi mężczyźni stają na drodze meksykańskich bandytów i złego, skorumpowanego biznesmena. Ci będą chcieli odzyskać skradziony łup.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Painted Desert
programme.desc: A mightly melodrama of red-blooded action, William Boyd stars in the Pre-Code western talkie - The Painted Desert (1931). The first sound film for Hollywood heavyweight Clark Gable, The Painted Desert finds Boyd and Gable at odds over the affections of a cowboy's beautiful daughter (Helen Twelvetrees).

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Hit the Saddle
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers get involved when a local sheriff is killed in this B-western from Republic Pictures. The trouble starts when a villainous rancher (J.P. McGowan) plots to steal some government protected horses. Bob Livingstone, Max Terhune, and Ray Corrigan star as the gallant Mesquiteers, while a young Rita Hayworth (Gilda, The Lady From Shanghai) appears as a sexy saloon singer who turns a Mesquiteer's head.

programme.title: Raiders of the Border
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal Nevada Jack McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) and Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton) go undercover to catch jewelry smugglers in this vintage western from Monogram Pictures. This was one of the last films directed by John P. McCarthy (Song of the Gringo, The Oklahoma Cyclone), while Johnny Mack Brown would go on to find great success as Nevada Jack; this was the fourth of 19 films where he played the crime busting marshal.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Blood on the Land
programme.desc: Adam Cartwright finds himself hostage to Jeb, a dangerous sheep herder who wants Ben to sign over a large plot of land.Starring Michael Landon as Little Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben helps three deserters, escaped from an Army stockade. Learning what they had to deal with, Ben promises to share the truth with his friend who is in charge of the fort.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben and Adam are in jail, about to be hung for a crime they didn't commit. Joe and Hoss must find out why the witnesses to the alleged crime have lied about what happened before the execution takes place. They receive help from a vagrant named Lassiter who is looking for the men who committed a lynching in Kansas years ago.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The son of a neighboring rancher intends to sell their land for a mining operation that will ruin the water rights agreement that Andy and Ben made years ago. Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights take a young boy to the Ponderosa after the death of his mother. Hoss is the only one that is able to get through the boy's hostility and bitterness, but, as the two begin to get close, the boy's father breaks out of prison and comes to retrieve the boy.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Little Joe Cartwright tries to help a gypsy girl who was abandoned by her people - because they believed she was a werewolf.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Kate's Recipe for Hot Rhubarb
programme.desc: Kate tries to teach Betty Jo how to make hot rhubarb after setting her up on a double date. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Jean Yarbrough. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired November 12, 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Bank robbers stay the night at Shady Rest hoping to intercept a bank shipment on the Cannonball.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Directed by Sherman Marks. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe is pelted with eggs after his team, the Hooterville Hornets, lose a game. Worse, Bedloe is back in town, which is never a good sign. It turns out Bedloe is planning a suroprise inspection with help frmo the railroad. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 A Night at the Hooterville Hilton
programme.desc: Upon reading a fantastical brochure Uncle Joe made, a hotel critic comes to Shady Rest. Can Hooterville live up to Joe's hype? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Homer Bedloe (Charles Lane) threatens to close down the Cannonball on Christmas Eve, disrupting the Shady Rest hotel's holiday plans. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Directed by Guy Scarpita. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Custer's Last Stand
programme.desc: The survivor of an Indian attack acquires a rare medicine arrow, and a menacing character named Blade (Reed Howes) will stop at nothing to take it from him. Elmer Clifton (Assassin of Youth, Seven Doors to Death) directs a memorable cast that includes Rex Lease (The Sign of the Wolf, The Monster Walks), Lona Andre (Slaves in Bondage, Death in the Air), and William Farnum (Samson and Delilah). Meanwhile, Frank McGlynn Jr is in the title role of General George A. Custer.

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: Lawless Frontier
programme.desc: John Wayne stars in this vintage western about a man avenging the murder of his parents. Other cast members include frequent Wayne sidekick George 'Gabby Hayes', plus Yakima Canutt, Sheila Terry, and Jack Rockwell. This Paul Malvern Production from director Robert N. Bradbury also features Earl Dwire, one of the great B-movie villains, as Zanti, the ruthless bandit who sets the action in motion.

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: The Fighting Westerner
programme.desc: A mining engineer tries to solve the murders of several heirs to a valuable radium mine in this western drama from Paramount Pictures. Stars include Charles Chic Sale, and in one of his early roles, Randolph Scott. This feature, also known as Rocky Mountain Mystery, was directed by Oscar winner Charles Barton, who would go on to direct several popular television shows, including Petticoat Junction and Family Affair...

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: A Lust to Kill
programme.desc: An imprisoned outlaw escapes and goes on the hunt for his brothers murderers, who just happen to be members of the outlaws own gang. He and his beloved hit the trail, but are pursued by local law enforcement, who have their own plans for justice. Starring Don Megowan, Jim Davis, and Allison Hayes.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Annie Makes a Marriage
programme.desc: Annie tries to help an ex-convict prove his innocence so that he can be with the woman he loves. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Sam is framed by Duke and his gang, who have kidnapped Linda to prevent Sam from proving his innocence. Its up to Annie and Lofty to save Sam from an angry mob, save Linda from Duke and his gang, and take them down for their crimes. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annies younger brother finds himself in danger when he gets in trouble with The Shadow Gang after running away with a friend. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: To everyones excitement, Boiler ODoul arrives in Diablo with the towns new steam fire engine. When the bank is robbed, Annie must think of a creative way to smoke out the criminals. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: Annie faces off against dangerous twin sisters, Dana and Jana Matthews. Annie is fast with a gun, but is she fast enough to take on a duo known as The Trigger Twins? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: When the towns doctor is unable to save his own father, he loses confidence in his work. Annie tries to convince him that Diablo needs him. Can Annie help him reclaim his confidence? Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Hurricane Horseman
programme.desc: Pancho Gomez kidnaps Don Roberto and his daughter, Tonita for ransom. Can an undercover lawman named Gun Smith save the pair, or will he be caught himself?! Smith gets a job in Gomez's camp supposedly to repair their guns. Instead he fixes the guns so they will misfire. When Gomez refuses to let him go, he sends his horse for the Sheriff! This campy western from 1931 stars Lane Chandler and is sure to keep you enthralled from beginning to end. Directed by Armand Schaefer; starring Marie Quillan and Walter Miller.

programme.title: Tulsa
programme.desc: Susan Hayward stars in this dramatic tale of the Oklahoma oil boom. She plays Cherokee Lansing, a determined young woman out to protect her father's honor after he's killed by men from a competing oil company. With a cast that includes Robert Preston, Ed Begley, and Pedro Armendariz, this engaging picture from producer Walter Wanger (Cleopatra, I Want to Live!) was nominated for an Academy Award in the Special Effects category. Also, listen for veteran character actor Chill Wills as the narrator!

programme.title: The Trail Beyond
programme.desc: Rod Drew (John Wayne) is in search of a missing miner and his daughter in this Lone Star Picture. Along the way, Drew rescues his pal Wabbi (Noah Beery Jr.) from card cheats who have framed him for murder. You'll find plenty of action and suspense in this vintage horse opera, originally distributed by the kings of the B western, Monogram Pictures!

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: The sons of a Colorado cattle baron, one biological and the other adopted, resent one another and fight for control of their father's cattle empire.

programme.title: High Lonesome
programme.desc: A young drifter is suspected of murder in this stirring production from writer/director Alan Le May (best known for writing The Searchers). John Drew Barrymore stars as Cooncat, a troubled young man who has to steal to survive. With no friends in West Texas, he falls in with some bad customers who involve him in some terrible crimes. The strong cast includes Chill Wills, Jack Elam, and John Archer, with cinematography by Oscar winner W. Howard Greene.

programme.title: Wagon Trail
programme.desc: The son of Sheriff Clay Hartley, of the frontier town Elder, has gotten into bad company and hangs out with an outlaw gang in which, Collins, owner of the Golden Rule Saloon, is the secret head. Sheriff Hartley suspects him, but has been unable to gather the needed evidence. Collins instructs his gang, including young Hartley, to hold up the stagecoach on its return trip from Missionary Flats and take the cargo of gold dust it is carrying. Sheriff Hartley is notified of the planned holdup by one of his deputies who has been spying on Collins, and organizes a posse. A deputy-sheriff is killed in the ensuing gunfight between the lawmen and the outlaws, but Deputy Joe Larkin, pursues and...

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes they've made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark tracks down the James Brothers who seek revenge on the law following the death of their half-brother.This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954. Also, look for legendary tough guy actor lee Van Cleef as Jesse James.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.desc: Railroad detective Matt Clark is challenged by a band of freight-car robbers led by Apache chief Geronimo. This western adventure series earned a Primetime Emmy in 1955.. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, plus Chief Yowlachie and Emile Meyer. Directed by William Witney.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Episode first aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, a woman arrives in town looking for her son. Roy checks around, and finds out that her son is not only in the area, but has become a notorious outlaw. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Spirit of the Law
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West.In this episode, Judge Bean intervenes when two brothers accuse each other of crimes including cattle rustling. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: With the help of Annie and Lofty, Clay Griffin, a lawman whose eyesight is deteriorating, confronts Johnny Storm and the Murdocks after they are involved in a robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.desc: After raising money for charity with a circus sideshow, Annie and Tagg are robbed of their money by a man named the Welshman. Annie and Lofty set up a trap with one last performance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook suspect that Carpenter is being bamboozled by the Mohawk guide helping him establish a new settlement. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.desc: Tensions rise when a Tuscarawas man tries to incite war against the settlers. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: The Cartwrights try to invalidate a Spanish land grant to stop the De La Cuesta family from taking part of the Ponderosa and all of the Carson Valley settlers' land.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Home in Oklahoma
programme.desc: The entire gang is here! Roy Rogers, Dale Evans, Gabby Hayes, and Trigger are all involved in a murder mystery involving the death of a wealthy ranch owner. Songs include I Wish I Was A Kid Again and Cowboy Ham and Eggs.

programme.title: Arizona Bound
programme.desc: The Rough Riders are called upon to help save a stagecoach line. From 1941, starring Buck Jones and Tim McCoy, plus Horace Murphy and Luana Walters. Directed by Spencer Bennett.

programme.title: Code of the Fearless
programme.desc: Fred Scott plays a lawman who goes undercover to expose a dangerous gang of criminals in this action-packed drama. He also has time to sing three songs: Cactus Pete, Gonna Ride, and Heres Romance. Screenwriter Fred Myton would go on to write such offbeat features as Nabonga, and Border Phantom.

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: The Hanged Man
programme.desc: After a condemned gunfighter (Steve Forrest) survives his own hanging, he helps a young widow stop a pitiless land baron from taking her ranch. This television feature boasts a strong cast of recognizable characters, including Will Geer, Sharon Acker, Dean Jagger, BarBara Luna, and Cameron Mitchell. Director Michael Caffey would go on to work on such hit shows as Barnaby Jones and MacGyver. Also, look for John Mitchum, younger brother of Robert, in a small role. This movie originally aired on ABC-TV and was considered the pilot for a possible series. Writer/producer Andrew Fenady was behind several opular TV shows such as Branded and The Rebel, as well as the 1970 John Wayne feature, Chisum.

programme.title: Man from Utah
programme.desc: WHIRLING ROPES AND SNARLING GUNS IN THE GALLOPING GRIP OF A GLAMOROUS DRAMA! John Wayne stars as John Weston, a man hired to investigate shady doings at a local rodeo. It seems all the riders who are on the verge of winning end up dead. Along with Wayne, this tale of action on the range also stars the usual Lone Star Picture stock company, including Gabby Hayes and Yakima Canutt!

programme.title: Back to 1942
programme.desc: Głód, na który składa się wiele czynników i niszczycielskie skutki, podczas drugiej wojny chińsko-japońskiej, jest kroniką z oficjalnej perspektywy reporterów, generałów, polityków i prawdziwych rodzin.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Acrimony
programme.desc: Wierna żona jest rozwścieczona krętactwami swego męża, gdy staje się jasne, że ją zdradził.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Pociąg straceńców
programme.desc: W 1938 roku armia japońska przejęła kontrolę nad ważną linią kolejową, przez co połączenie pomiędzy północą a południem Chin stało się głównym szlakiem transportu zrabowanych zasobów, broni i amunicji wroga. Miejscowi robotnicy zakładają więc podziemny ruch oporu.

programme.title: Special Ops
programme.desc: Zaatakowany przez terrorystów porzucony amerykański żołnierz walczy o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Honor i siła
programme.desc: Do małego węgierskiego miasteczka przybywa Janos – charyzmatyczny i tajemniczy mężczyzna z wyraźnie przywódczymi aspiracjami, który z miejsca znajduje posłuch wśród dwóch młodych braci z trudnej rodziny.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Ilu miałaś facetów?
programme.desc: Ally Darling jest zaniepokojona po przeczytaniu artykułu w gazecie, według którego ludzie, którzy mieli 20 lub więcej partnerów zaprzepaścili szansę na znalezienie prawdziwej miłości.

programme.title: Pociąg straceńców
programme.desc: W 1938 roku armia japońska przejęła kontrolę nad ważną linią kolejową, przez co połączenie pomiędzy północą a południem Chin stało się głównym szlakiem transportu zrabowanych zasobów, broni i amunicji wroga. Miejscowi robotnicy zakładają więc podziemny ruch oporu.

programme.title: Marmaduke - pies na fali
programme.desc: Ekranizacja sławnej, długo nadawanego komiksu o wielkim psie o imieniu Marmaduke

programme.title: Heat - Gorączka
programme.desc: Neil McCauley (Robert De Niro), złodziej wysokiej rangi, wzbił się na szczyt kariery dzięki inteligencji, czujności oraz byciu nieuchwytnym. Detektyw Vince Hanna (Al Pacino) jest niezawodny w swoim fachu i tym razem wziął na swój cel McCauleya.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Chestnut: Hero of Central Park
programme.desc: Młode siostry osierocone Sal i Rae sądzą, że trafiły w dziesiątkę, kiedy znajdują uroczego szczeniaka Great Dane tego samego dnia, kiedy dowiedują się, że zostały adoptowane ...

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Jake trafia do więzienia, chroniąc swoich przyjaciół. W międzyczasie jego najlepszy kumpel, Chris, wyrywa się z przestępczego świata i zostaje policjantem. Gdy po 15 latach Jake wychodzi na wolność, rozpoczyna krwawą wendettę.

programme.title: Lekarstwo na życie
programme.desc: Młody mężczyzna przybywa do sielankowego spa w szwajcarskich Aplach, aby zabrać stamtąd swojego szefa. Mężczyzna szybko odkrywa, że cudowne leczenie skrywa mroczny sekret.

programme.title: Counterattack
programme.desc: Elitarny najemnik ucieka do dżungli po tym, jak został wrobiony w zabójstwo potentata naftowego. Towarzyszy mu reporterka, która ma dowód jego niewinności.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Zaginiona dziewczyna
programme.desc: ZAGINIONA DZIEWCZYNA - w reżyserii Davida Finchera i oparta na światowym bestsellerze Gillian Flynn - ujawnia tajemnice skrywane przez współczesne małżeństwo.

programme.title: Aftershock
programme.desc: Dziewczynka ocalała po trzęsieniu ziemi opuszcza rodzinę, która myśli, że nie udało jej się przeżyć.

programme.title: Snajperzy
programme.desc: Podczas wojny antyjapońskiej Yang Haotian, żołnierz Nowej 4. Armii, prowadzi swoich poległych towarzyszy z powrotem do swojej jednostki, gdy spotyka Qin Yu, oficera wywiadu nacjonalistycznego, ściganego przez Japończyków w Lost Cloud Ridge.

programme.title: Deadfall
programme.desc: Przygotujcie się na gęstą sieć uwodzenia, zdrady, zabójstwa i chciwości w ekscytującym thrillerze z udziałem Michaela Biehna, Jamesa Coburna i Nicolasa Cage'a.

programme.title: Ares
programme.desc: Francja przyszłości. Władze próbują zapobiec buntowi głodujących ludzi, oferując im brutalny program telewizyjny z udziałem ich samych.

programme.title: Odrobina nieba
programme.desc: Marley jest piękna, młoda i odnosi sukcesy na każdym polu, oprócz spraw sercowych. Jej podejście do życia ulega zmianie, gdy wychodzi na jaw, że ma raka.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Paranoiczny thriller w kosmosie, który podąża za Royem McBride'em w misji przez bezlitosny układ słoneczny, aby odkryć prawdę o jego zaginionym ojcu i jego skazanej na wyprawę wyprawie, która teraz, 30 lat później, zagraża wszechświatowi.

programme.title: Pajac za burtą
programme.desc: Młody komik, któremu się nie wiedzie, podejmuje się pracy fizycznej na wycieczkowcu, gdzie ma nadzieję złapać wiatr w żagle i zrobić karierę w przemyśle rozrywkowym.

programme.title: The Negotiator
programme.desc: Danny Roman, biegły policyjny negocjator, chce oczyścić się z fałszywych zarzutów, więc przetrzymuje grupę zakładników w biurowcu, by zyskać czas potrzebny na odkrycie prawdy. Chris Sabian, tytułowy „Negocjator”, podejmuje próbę rozładowania sytuacji i zaangażowania Romana.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Podczas operacji zamożny młody mężczyzna doświadcza świadomości śródoperacyjnej i odkrywa, że zespół operacyjny chciał go zamordować.

programme.title: Diplomatic Siege
programme.desc: Specjalista od usuwania bomb Steve Mitchell zostaje wysłany do ambasady USA w Bukareszcie, aby rozbroić bombę atomową, ale jego misja zostaje przerwana, gdy grupa terrorystów szturmuje budynek i bierze zakładników.

programme.title: Fantastyczny Pan Lis
programme.desc: Pan i Pani Lis prowadzą szczęśliwe życie ze swoim ekscentrycznym synem Ashem. Wszystko się zmienia, kiedy Pan Lis knuje intrygę by dokonać największej kradzieży kurczaków jaką widział zwierzęcy świat.

programme.title: Oko (The Eye)
programme.desc: Niewidoma dziewczyna po zabiegu przeszczepu rogówki odzyskuje wzrok i niespodziewanie nabywa zdolność widzenia przerażających duchów.

programme.title: The Dog Who Saved Easter
programme.desc: To od Zeusa i jego nowych przyjaciół zależy ocalenie Wielkanocy, którą niemal niweczy stare i nowe poczucie zemsty.

programme.title: The Perfect Match
programme.desc: Charlie (Terrence J) to kawaler przekonany, że związki nie mają sensu, mimo że jego siostra i zarazem terapeutka (Paula Patton) oraz przyjaciele próbują przekonać go, że nie ma racji.

programme.title: Golden Shoes
programme.desc: Młody chłopak oddaje serce narodu, gdy pokonuje zastraszanie, nietolerancję i tragiczną sytuację domową, aby realizować swoje marzenie o grze w piłkę nożną.

programme.title: Święta jak malowane
programme.desc: Dla doświadczającej trudności malarki Heidi Neill Boże Narodzenie w Nowym Jorku nie są wcale cudowne.

programme.title: Where's the Money?
programme.desc: W tej skandalicznie śmiesznej komedii Del, sprytny młodzieniec wychowany na ulicach South Central Los Angeles, dowiaduje się, że jego osadzony ojciec wraz z wujkiem, który właśnie wyszedł na wolność (Terry Crews), ukradli milion dolarów i pieniądze ukryli w piwnicy noclegowni.

programme.title: A ty myślałeś; że twoi rodzice są dziwni!
programme.desc: Sympatyczny robot imieniem Newman zabierze Josha i Maxa na najbardziej fantastyczną przygodę ich życia.
